name: Youth of the European People's Party
goal:
Act as the European-level umbrella organisation of centre-right youth organisations.

Act as the youth organisation of the European Peopleâ€™s Party and the EPP Group in the European Parliament.

Organise the exchange of information and practices between the member organisations.
interests: Communication, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Youth
euInitiatives:
In 2017, YEPP adopted a new political agenda "A stronger Europe in a changing world". As Europe is facing crises on every front from migration, Eurosceptism and radicalisation, we strive to be the youth voice for the centre-right on all issues facing Europe. It is our aim to create concrete policies in relation to these issues.

While of course we have a focus on youth issues other major topics for YEPP are:
-Digital Agenda
-Single Market
-Job Creation
-Trans-Atlantic Relations
